rules.createWords: Create words using the letters shown.
rules.atleastFourLetters: Words must have at least four letters
rules.centerLetter: Words must include the center letter.
rules.moreThanOne: Letters can be used more than once.
rules.notIntheList: Words with hyphens, proper nouns, vulgarities, and especially obscure words are not in the word list.
rules.fiveLetters: Five-letter words are worth 6 point and six-letter words 1 point more.
rules.pangrams: Pangrams — words that use all seven letters — are worth 10 points. There is at least one pangram per puzzle
